results.title: Chiapas Army Base occupation (Mexico) Jan 1, 2001
results.brief_description: This astounding testimony to ‘the power of the people’ was given to the Memory Grid Community Collection as part of the SKA TV video compile ‘Global Insights 4’, a collection of shorts from around the world with a focus on grass-roots peoples’ action. Chiapas Army Base (Mexico) was filmed by Big Noise Tactical (USA) a not-for-profit, all-volunteer collective of media-makers around the world, ‘dedicated to circulating beautiful, passionate, revolutionary images.’

results.title: Chemistry of soapless detergents
results.creator_credit: Sam Napier-Bell, George Seager, De La Chevre Films and Unilever Films
results.brief_description: Explains the molecular reaction between water and soapless detergent; molecules; research on the process of synthetization from petrol hydrocarbons. Laboratory demonstration of the production of Alkylbenzene sulphonate basis for a whole range of soapless detergent products for domestic use. Large scale production methods are also shown.

results.title: Chemistry for sixth forms: catalysis
results.creator_credit: Phil Wrestler, Donald Carter and Associated Television
results.brief_description: The term “catalysis” and its importance in industrial processes; homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis; catalytic cracking of petroleum; Faraday’s theory on the cause of surface catalysis; Sabatier-Senderens process using nickel as a catalyst in hydrogenation of vegetable oils; effect of poisons on surface catalysis; effect of manganese dioxide on hydrogen peroxide.

results.title: Cheddar Gorge and its caves
results.brief_description: Traces the history of the Cheddar Gorge and its caves from the Stone Age to the present day. Some animated sequences assist with the explanation.

results.title: Charlie Chalkman's chalk catcher challenge
results.brief_description: This interactive game is designed for younger children. Set on a chalkboard, the main character Charlie (controlled by the player) tries to catch the falling chalks and fruits to achieve a high score. The player must also avoid the falling erasers, which if touched, rub Charlie out to end the game.

results.title: Charles Rennie Mackintosh
results.creator_credit: W. Thomson and S E F A Productions
results.brief_description: The work and achievements of Charles Rennie Mackintosh, architect and painter, in relation to Scottish traditions, the style of his own time and the Art Nouveau movement. Commentary: R. Horn.

results.title: Changing of the guard = Zmiana warty
results.brief_description: An animated fairy tale in which all of the characters - the soldier of the Royal Guard, the King’s daughter whom he loves, and all the King’s subjects are matchboxes which go up in flames because they have not learned the dangers of playing with fire.

results.title: Championship basketball highlights: 1975-76
results.brief_description: Includes highlights of the various basketball competitions in the USA during 1975-76. The Junior College Basketball Championship, the NAIA Championship, the NCAA Division II Championship, the AIAW National Championship, the NCAA University Division Championship, the NBA and the ABA Championship are all covered. Interspersed with these is a segment on a basketball camp, in Homesdale, Penn., the talented Tripuca family, and the Converse All America Team.
